EmailTemplate.name: 3_20_2014_VMUG Austin Follow up.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Austin VMUG: Thank You V-Much
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=We Just Wanted to}} Thank You. Thanks for chatting with us at VMUG Austin 2014. We wanted to send you some resources that show how VMTurbo has redefined the virtual ops landscape, improving the way that world-class organizations control and automate their virtual data centers.
Trial http://bit.ly/1c2UT5R Watch http://bit.ly/1eSiDth Read http://bit.ly/NaXBjL
Everyone learns differently. Pick your means of enlightenment above. We'll be in touch soon to see if VMTurbo can take your environment to the next level.
In good health, VMTurbo
